list_definition.mean_english: cuốn sách/ đĩa hát bán chạy nhất
list_definition.definition: something (usually a book) which sells very many copies

list_ex_of_english: I wonder whether perhaps, with a different cover and title, it could become a bestseller because it deserves to be.
Months later, the book has become a bestseller.
This sound treatment software quickly became a bestseller, used by every professional working with music and sound, especially in the cinema.
The books are direct and accessible, and they were bestsellers.
Some thoughts, perhaps, for the next edition of what will surely, and rightly, be a bestseller? !
For example, a summer bestseller is usually determined long before the summer is over, and signals a book's suitability for millions of lounging pool-side readers.
The bestseller lists tell a tale of easy reading in preference to more stimulating material.
Without that publicity, the book would probably have sold only a modest number of copies, instead of becoming a bestseller.
